item.description: Nov 2025 Xuanhao Fan started his PhD under my supervision. Oct 2025 Human Motion Unlearning is accepted at AAAI 2026. Sep 2025 Awarded the Nvidia academic grant for the project “LLMs Can teach your robot to speak”. Jul 2025 MonSTeR is accepted at ICCV 2025.

item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: Links to other websites Other websites referenced here may collect information about you, use cookies, embed additional tracking services from third parties, and record your interaction with that embedded content, including your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are signed in to that website.

item.title: TEACHING
item.description: Courses Fundamentals of Data Science / Foundation of Data Science 25/26 M.Sc. in Data Science and M.Sc. in Computer Science, Sapienza University of Rome. Previous Years [24/25] Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Unit 1 23/24 B.Sc. in Applied Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence, Sapienza University of Rome. Thesis We are pursuing several projects in the following research areas: Generative Models for 3D/4D/Robotics/Computer Use and Trustworthy Machine Learning.
